sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de xiǎngfǎ hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ton idée est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your idea is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā měitiān qíchē shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il va au travail à vélo chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He rides a bike to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yínháng zài chāoshì de zuǒbiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La banque est à gauche du supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bank is on the left of the supermarket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhànzhù! Bié pǎo!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Arrête-toi ! Ne cours pas !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Stop! Don't run!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bǎ zhè běn shū sònggěi nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux t'offrir ce livre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to give this book to you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎoshíhou wǒ zhù zài nóngcūn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quand j'étais petit, j'habitais à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: When I was young, I lived in the countryside.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这些是我的书，它们都很有趣。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē shì wǒ de shū, tāmen dōu hěn yǒuqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce sont mes livres, ils sont tous très intéressants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These are my books, they are all very interesting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ liǎng piàn miànbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donne-moi deux tranches de pain, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me two slices of bread.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yī zhāng zhǐ xiě zì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'une feuille de papier pour écrire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need a piece of paper to write.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù hěn píng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est très plate.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is very flat.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 大多数人都同意这个决定。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàduōshù rén dōu tóngyì zhège juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La plupart des gens sont d'accord avec cette décision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Most people agree with this decision.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 如果你有时间的话，来找我。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ yǒu shíjiān de huà, lái zhǎo wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Si tu as du temps, viens me voir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If you have time, come find me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān qù páshān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons faire de l'escalade demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We're going to climb a mountain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chǎocài xūyào fàng yīdiǎn yóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut mettre un peu d'huile pour faire sauter les légumes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to add some oil when stir-frying.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shuǐ dào jìn bēizi lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Verse l'eau dans le verre, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pour the water into the cup.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī tào xīn xīzhuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté un nouveau costume.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a new suit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào zài zhèlǐ chōuyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne fumez pas ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't smoke here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè piān wénzhāng xūyào gǎi yī gǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet article a besoin d'être corrigé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This article needs to be revised.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè duǒ huā wén qǐlái hěn xiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fleur sent très bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This flower smells very fragrant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dú le dàliàng de shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a lu une grande quantité de livres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He read a large number of books.
